intro.title: Who We Are
intro.desc: Qeyafa is a leading Saudi tech company founded to redefine the custom fashion experience. We merge traditional tailoring authenticity with cutting-edge AI and Computer Vision to deliver perfect fit and superior quality for everyone.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.desc: To be the Global Leading Ecosystem for custom tailoring, transforming the experience from a complex traditional process into a seamless, precise, and sustainable digital journey.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.desc: Empowering individuals to express their identity through custom designs, and enabling local artisans to reach a global audience via an integrated tech platform.

values.title: Our Values
values.sustainability: Zero-Waste: Made-to-measure means no inventory waste.
values.empowerment: Empowerment: Supporting local Saudi designers and SMEs.
values.efficiency: Efficiency: Fast turnaround from measurement to delivery.

engine.title: Proprietary Computer Vision Engine
engine.desc: We don't use traditional tools. Our tech converts 4 photos (front, back, side) into a precise 3D parametric model.

market.stats: Targeting the $6.5B custom tailoring market in KSA, aiming to capture 460M SAR market share within 5 years.
